title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Accounting/Commerce/Business Management or Economics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Accounting/Commerce/Business Management and any two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Accounting/Business management and any other Social Science subject.

title: AGRICULTURAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in Mathematics, Physics or Chemistry
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Chemistry and Physics.

title: BIOCHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.

 

NCE with merit  plus JAMB DE requirement.



ND with lower credit  plus JAMB DE requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics and Biology.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BIOLOGICAL SCIENCE(S)
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes to include one (1) of Botany, Zoology, Biology or Chemistry  plus JAMB DE requirement.

 

NCE with merit  plus JAMB DE requirement.



ND with lower credit  plus JAMB DE requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.

title: BUSINESS ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Accounting/Commerce and any other Social Science subject.

NCE with merit plus JAMB DE requirement.

ND with lower credit plus JAMB DE requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Accounting/Commerce/Business Management and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Accounting/Business Management/Mathematics and any other Social Science subject.

title: CHEMISTRY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) of Physics, Mathematics or Biology plus JAMB DE requirements.

 

NCE with merit plus JAMB DE requirements.


ND with lower credit
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry and two (2) of Physics, Biology and Mathematics.

title: CIVIL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics, Chemistry or Mathematics plus JAMB DE requirement. 

NCE with merit plus JAMB DE requirement.

ND with lower credit plus JAMB DE requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one Science subject
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics

title: COMPUTER SCIENCE
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes in science subjects including Mathematics.

 

NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) other Science or Social Science subject.


ND lower credit in Computer Science or any other related area.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Physics plus two (2) other Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one (1) of Biology, Chemistry, Agric Science, Economics and Geography.

title: ECONOMICS
de_requirements:
Two (2)'A' Level passes in Economics and any other Social Science subject.

NCE with merit plus JAMB DE requirement.  .

﻿ND with lower credit plus JAMB DE requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any other Social Science subject.

title: ELECTRICAL /ELECTRONICS ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics, Physics or Chemistry plus JAMB DE requirements

NCE Technical with at least merit plus JAMB DE requirements

ND lower credit in Electrical Electronics Engineering with JAMB DE requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, English Language and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: ENGLISH LANGUAGE
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes to include Literature in English and one other Arts subject  plus JAMB DE requirement.

NCE with merit  plus JAMB DE requirement

ND with lower credit  plus JAMB DE requirement
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include Literature in English, English Language and three other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English, one other Arts subject and another Arts or Social Science subject.

title: GEOPHYSICS
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and Physics or Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry/Biology.
subjects: Any three (3) of Physics, Chemistry, Biology and Mathematics.

title: HISTORY & INTERNATIONAL STUDIES
de_requirements:
Two A'level pass in History/Government and any other related subject  plus JAMB DE requirement.

NCE with merit plus JAMB DE requirement.

ND with lower credit  plus JAMB DE requirement.
utme_requirements: English Language, Government/History/Civic Education and any other two Social Science/Arts subjects.
subjects: Government/History and any other two from Social Science/Arts.

title: HUMAN ANATOMY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Biology, Chemistry and Physics plus JAMB DE requirement.

NCE with merit plus JAMB DE requirement.

ND with lower credit plus JAMB DE requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and Physics.

title: LAW
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Literature in English and any other Arts or Social Science subject plus JAMB DE requirement.

First Degree/HND in any discipline plus JAMB DE requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5)'O' Level credit passes to include English Language, Literature in English and Mathematics.
subjects: Literature in English and any two (2) Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: LIBRARY & INFORMATION MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subject plus the UTME requirements.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and three (3) other relevant Arts/Sciences/Social Sciences subjects.
subjects: Any three (3) subjects.

title: LIBRARY AND INFORMATION SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subje﻿cts plus the JAMB DE requirements.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects plus the JAMB DE requirements. 

(III) DIPLOMA in Library Science or any Social Science Discipline which must be from a Polytechnic, Monotechnic or any specialized institution under NBTE watch.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE   credit passes in English Language, Mathematics and three (3) other relevant Arts/Sciences/Social Sciences subjects.
subjects: English and any other three (3) subjects.

title: LIBRARY SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2)'A' Level passes in relevant subjects.
(ii) NCE/ND in relevant subject/programmes
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes including English Language and Mathematics.
subjects: Any three (3) Arts or Social Science subjects

title: MASS COMMUNICATION
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.

NCE with merit plus JAMB DE requirements.

ND with lower credit plus JAMB DE requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Literature in English and three (3) other subjects in Arts or Social Sciences.
subjects: Literature in English and any two subjects (2) from Arts or Social Science subjects.

title: MATHEMATICS
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and any other science subject plus JAMB DE requirements.

NCE merit in Mathematics and one (1) of Physics, Chemistry or Economics plus JAMB DE requirements.

ND with lower credit plus JAMB DE requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Mathematics and Physics or Chemistry and any  two (2) other science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics and any two (2) of Physics or Chemistry and Economics or Geography.

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)        Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

(ii)       ND at least lower credit, NCE technical and HND in Mech. Engineering.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and any other Science subject.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry.

title: MEDICAL LABORATORY SCIENCE
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes  to include Physics or Chemistry and Biology/Zoology plus JAMB DE requirement.

Medical Laboratory Technician plus JAMB DE requirement.

First Degree/HND in Biological Sciences from a recognized institution plus JAMB DE requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: MICROBIOLOGY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Chemistry and any one (1) from Biology, Zoology or Botany plus JAMB DE requirements.

NCE with merit plus JAMB DE requirements.

ND with lower credit plus JAMB DE requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry and either Physics or Mathematics.

title: NURSING/NURSING SCIENCE
de_requirements:
'A' Level passes in any two (2) of Biology/Zoology and Physics or Chemistry plus JAMB DE requirement.



RN or RM with evidence of Registration with the Nursing and Midwifery Council of Nigeria plus JAMB DE requirement.

﻿


First Degree in Biological Sciences from any recognized university.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics.

title: PHYSICS
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics or Chemistry.

NCE with merit  plus JAMB DE requirement.

ND with lower credit  plus JAMB DE requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other Science subject.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics and Chemistry or Biology.

title: PHYSIOLOGY
de_requirements:
Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Chemistry/Physics and Biology/Zoology/Botany  plus JAMB DE requirement.

NCE merit  plus JAMB DE requirement.

ND with lower credit  plus JAMB DE requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Physics, Chemistry and Biology

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements:
Two (2) A' Level passes to include Government or History plus JAMB DE requirements.

NCE with at least merit plus JAMB DE requirements.

ND with at least lower credit plus JAMB DE requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Government/History/Civic Education and any other three (3) subjects from Arts/Social Sciences.
subjects: Government/History and two (2)  other Social Sciences or Arts subjects.

title: PUBLIC ADMINISTRATION
de_requirements: Two (2)'A' Level passes including Government/History and any other Social Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Government/History/Civic Education and two (2) other relevant subjects.
subjects: Government/History and any two other Social Science subjects.

title: PUBLIC HEALTH
de_requirements:
'A' Level passes in any two (2) of Biology/Zoology/Botany and Physics/Chemistry/Mathematics

 plus JAMB DE requirement

NCE with merit  plus JAMB DE requirement.

ND with lower credit  plus JAMB DE requirement.

RN or its approved equivalent  plus JAMB DE requirement
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes including English Language, Physics, Mathematics, Chemistry and Biology.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology and Physics.

title: RELIGIOUS STUDIES
de_requirements:
Two (2) ‘A’ Level subjects to include Religious Studies (CRS/IRS).

NCE with merit plus JAMB DE requirements.

ND with lower credit plus JAMB DE requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language and CRS/IRS.
subjects: CRS/IRS and any other two (2) subjects.
